option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Use Conventional Commit format Use bullet points for multiple changes

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: redesign public cultural heritage page layout
- Refactor `page.tsx` to enhance maintainability and readability - Replace obsolete components with modern alternatives like `Panel` and `Accordion` - Add utility functions for formatting data and values consistently - Implement improved error and loading states with better user feedback - Refactor header and share functionalities for simplicity and responsiveness

task.summary: Default task

Add conservation status management functionality
Implemented CRUD operations for managing conservation statuses, including service, UI components, hooks, and utilities. Removed unused and redundant project configurations to clean up `.idea`, and introduced Prettier for auto-formatting settings. ```

Add entry form management functionality
Implemented entry form CRUD operations with service, hooks, UI components, and utilities. Enhanced styles and table interaction, added navigation support, and updated `.idea` settings for better project configuration.

Add fund title management feature
Implemented CRUD functionality for fund titles, including services, hooks, UI components, and utilities. Updated navigation and styles, added data table and export support, and introduced form and toolbar enhancements.

Add generic classification management feature
Implemented CRUD functionality for generic classifications, including services, hooks, and UI components. Added components for table display, data forms, toolbars, and export functionality, alongside routing, styles, and utility enhancements. Updated navigation and configuration for seamless integration.

Add heritage type management feature
Implemented CRUD functionality for heritage types, including hooks, services, and UI components such as forms, tables, and toolbars. Added routing, styles, and utility functions for seamless integration and enhanced user interaction. Updated navigation and configuration to support the new feature.

Add reproduction conditions management feature
Implemented CRUD functionality for managing reproduction conditions, including services, hooks, and UI components such as tables, forms, and toolbars. Added routing, styles, and utilities to ensure seamless integration and user interaction. Updated navigation to include the new feature.

Add Section management feature with CRUD functionality
Implemented components, services, hooks, and utilities for managing sections including listing, creation, editing, and deletion. Updated navigation and styles to integrate the feature seamlessly into the application.

feat(value-grade): add CRUD functionality for Value Grade management
- Introduced new `ValueGrade` page with components for listing, form, table, and toolbar - Implemented `useHookValueGrade` to manage state and operations - Created `ValueGradeService` for API interactions (fetch, create, update, delete) - Added navigation entry for Value Grade in `modelAppmenuConst` - Integrated utility functions for formatting and export - Applied custom styles and localized UI messages for Value Grade features

feat(app-menu): enhance AppMenuitem with `useRef` for CSSTransition
- Added `useRef` to manage `nodeRef` in `CSSTransition` for submenu - Improved submenu rendering by referencing `ul` elements - Refactored imports for better organization

refactor: optimize table components and improve filtering
- Simplified props destructuring and formatting in `TableCustom` components - Enhanced filtering with additional filter configurations in `tableBodyFunction` - Added scrollable tables and row filtering display - Removed redundant styles in `ButtonStyles.module.css` - Fixed `useEffect` dependency in `useGenericHook` for proper service usage

feat: process date fields in NomenclatureAccessConditions
- Add processing of `createdAt` and `updatedAt` fields to ensure consistent Date objects - Update `.idea` workspace settings for VCS log tabs

feat: enhance data processing and filtering in tables
- Add `processedDatum` to standardize date formats for table data across multiple pages - Introduce column-level filtering with calendar-based date filtering - Improve column configurations for better usability: adjustable widths, ellipsis for overflow, and placeholders - Update `TableCustom` component for cleaner props handling and added scrollable UI support - Simplify and enhance table rendering logic by utilizing spread operator for column props

feat: enhance data processing and filtering in tables
- Add `processedDatum` to standardize date formats for table data across multiple pages - Introduce column-level filtering with calendar-based date filtering - Improve column configurations for better usability: adjustable widths, ellipsis for overflow, and placeholders - Update `TableCustom` component for cleaner props handling and added scrollable UI support - Simplify and enhance table rendering logic by utilizing spread operator for column props

feat: add Playwright testing and configuration setup
- Introduced Playwright with `playwright.config.ts` for end-to-end testing - Added example test case for homepage in `tests/home.spec.ts` - Updated `pnpm-lock.yaml` with Playwright dependencies - Improved development workflows with testing guidelines in `.junie/guidelines.md` - Ignored built dependency `sharp` in `pnpm-workspace.yaml`

feat: add documentation for improvement tasks
- Added detailed improvement tasks in `docs/tasks.md` to enhance codebase quality, maintainability, and performance - Included sections for architecture, code quality, testing, performance, accessibility, DevOps, and security improvements

docs: add improvement plans and project requirements
- Add `docs/plan.md` detailing key improvement strategies for Museo-CPanel, including architecture, performance, security, testing, and UX - Include `docs/requirements.md` outlining project requirements, functional goals, technical constraints, and quality attributes

feat: add MongoDB schema to `.idea` workspace
- Include MongoDB schema configuration file for database inspection and management in `.idea/dataSources/` - Add support for multiple schemas including `museum`, `admin`, `config`, and `local` for improved project setup - Define table structures, columns, and indexes for better database organization

chore: update `.idea` workspace and MongoDB configuration
- Synchronize workspace settings with updated IntelliJ version - Adjust MongoDB driver and schema details for better compatibility and management

chore: update `.idea` workspace and MongoDB configuration
- Synchronize workspace settings with updated IntelliJ version - Adjust MongoDB driver and schema details for better compatibility and management

- feat: modularize recent entries table into reusable component
- Create `CulturalPropertyTable` for displaying recent cultural property entries - Replace inline implementation with new reusable table component - Add modal for detailed cultural property information with improved UI and data rendering
- refactor: update color codes for conservation statuses
- Adjust green, yellow, and red shades for better visual clarity - Ensure consistent coloring across application components
- chore: clean up logs and unused code
- Remove unnecessary `console.log` statements from `DashboardService` - Eliminate unused color generation logic for simplicity
- chore: update workspace settings
- Synchronize `.idea` directory with recent project changes - Add new recent template option: `TypeScript JSX File` in settings

- feat: add `RecentActivityCard` component and integrate into the main page
- Extract recent activity functionality into the new reusable `RecentActivityCard` component - Add export to CSV and refresh functionalities within the component - Replace inline activity implementation in the main page with `RecentActivityCard` usage
- chore: update `.idea` workspace configuration
- Synchronize workspace settings with recent project changes - Update task details and entries for improved development tracking

- feat: enhance `RecentActivityCard` and refactor recent entries logic
- Add dynamic heritage type icon mapping with corresponding colors and styles - Increase displayed recent entries from 2 to 4, improving user insight - Simplify `DashboardService` logic by reducing redundant operations - Adjust `.idea` workspace configuration for improved project tracking

feat: update export functionality in `RecentActivityCard`
- Replace CSV export method with Excel export using `xlsx` library - Add formatted headers and dynamic column widths for improved output readability - Update export command to integrate new Excel export functionality
chore: remove redundant whitespace in `RecentActivityCard` component

feat: localize and enhance landing page
- Add support for Spanish text in the landing page - Update styles with a theme consistent with cultural heritage branding - Replace placeholders with meaningful content emphasizing Cuba's cultural heritage - Introduce navigation functionalities for login and collection exploration - Improve design consistency across features to match cultural heritage context

feat: remove cultural property heritage components and models
- Delete `CulturalPropertyTable`, `CulturalPropertyForm`, and associated panels - Remove `culturalProperty.model` and related type definitions - Clear utility functions and references linked to cultural property models - Refactor related data and logic from codebase

feat: remove cultural property heritage services and refactor related components
- Delete `CulturalHeritagePropertyService` and related utility functions - Refactor `ToolbarCommon` to support dynamic start and end actions - Update `CulturalPropertyService` to rely on simplified `CulturalHeritageProperty` types - Adjust `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` for optional hooks and dynamic data handling - Remove unused type definitions and service utilities

feat: add status management and bulk update functionality to cultural property forms
- Introduce status dropdowns and "Apply to all" buttons in `AssociatedDocumentationForm`, `CulturalRecordForm`, `DescriptionControlForm`, and `EntryAndLocationForm` - Add modular state management and update methods for bulk status updates across related fields - Enhance panel headers with dynamic templates for better user interaction and customizability

feat: add edit/view mode handling for cultural property list
- Introduce `isEditModeRef` to track and manage edit/view mode - Add `handleEditOrView` method to support edit and view functionality - Update `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` component to handle `onEditOrView` callback - Ensure backward compatibility with `onAddNew` as a fallback method

feat: refactor authentication and context integration
- Replace `withAuth` HOC with updated implementation for improved token handling and auth checks - Add `AppProvider` to the root layout to support application-wide state management - Enhance `httpAdapter` with robust error handling and redirection logic for unauthorized requests - Introduce preloader in `Layout` for authentication loading state - Remove unused imports and refactor to align with latest interface changes

feat: enhance cultural property components and update workspace settings
- Refactor `EntryAndLocationForm` with stricter type casting and required field support - Improve `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` with better text overflow handling and updated column styles - Adjust `.idea/workspace.xml` to include recent work items and cleanup unnecessary changes

feat: add heritage type filtering and dynamic dropdown support
- Integrate heritage type filtering in `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` component - Fetch heritage types dynamically via `HeritageTypeService` - Add `useEffect` for fetching and managing heritage type data - Update global filter and column filters with heritage type support - Enhance table functionality with a custom dropdown filter template

feat: add status filtering to cultural property list
- Introduce dynamic status filtering in `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` using a dropdown filter - Update global filters and column configurations to support status filtering - Enhance table functionality with a `statusFilterTemplate` - Adjust filter header styles for consistent layout

feat: fetch heritage types dynamically and improve loading state
- Add `useEffect` in `CulturalHeritagePropertyPage` to fetch heritage types dynamically via `HeritageTypeService` - Move heritage types data fetching responsibility from `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` to parent component for better state management - Display loading spinner and message while fetching heritage type data - Pass fetched heritage types as props to `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` for usage in dropdown filtering

feat: refactor dropdown data handling and enhance component integration
- Implement `useAllDropdownData` custom hook to centralize dropdown data fetching and state management - Integrate `useAllDropdownData` in `CulturalHeritagePropertyPage` to improve data loading and error handling - Remove inline dropdown data definitions in `CulturalRecordForm`, `EntryAndLocationForm`, and `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` - Update `CulturalHeritagePropertyWizard` to pass dropdown data as props to child forms - Improve component reusability and maintainability by standardizing dropdown handling logic

feat: optimize field components and enhance producer-author form integration
- Add `disabled` prop support to `FieldWithHistory` for improved control over field interactions - Refactor `FieldWithHistory` layout and component rendering for cleaner code and maintainability - Introduce memoization and improved state management in `ProducerAuthorForm` to enhance performance - Optimize municipality fetching logic based on province input changes - Refactor repetitive field update logic in `ProducerAuthorForm` for better readability and consistency

feat: improve type safety in `CulturalRecordForm`
- Update `getUpdatedStatus` call to enforce `Status` type casting for better type safety and consistency

feat: improve recent activity and cultural property components
- Replace `CulturalPropertyModel` with `CulturalHeritageProperty` for better type alignment - Add text truncation utility in `CulturalPropertyTable` to handle long text entries gracefully - Update column field mappings in `CulturalPropertyTable` for accurate data rendering - Enhance `RecentActivityCard` with improved type safety and dynamic content display - Clean up formatting and redundant code for improved readability

feat: add generic classification dropdown support
- Extend `useAllDropdownData` hook to fetch and include `genericClassificationOptions` - Pass `genericClassificationOptions` to `EntryAndLocationForm` and `CulturalHeritagePropertyWizard` - Remove hardcoded generic classification options in `EntryAndLocationForm` for improved maintainability - Update dropdown rendering logic in `CulturalHeritagePropertyWizard` to use fetched data

feat: add filtering support to dropdown and multiselect components
- Enable `filter` functionality for `Dropdown` and `MultiSelect` components in `FieldWithHistory` - Add column filters with `filter` support to `CulturalHeritagePropertyList` for improved usability

feat: enhance error handling and role-based user interface
- Replace `handleApiError` with `ApiError` class for better error processing and user-friendly messages - Introduce detailed conflict resolution logic in `handleApiError` for specific field conflicts - Add role-based logic in `CulturalHeritagePropertyPage` to manage user roles dynamically via local storage - Update `CulturalHeritagePropertyWizard` to support role-based UI control with `isSuperAdmin` checks - Refactor `useManagement` to utilize `ApiError` and improve error handling consistency across the application

feat: add institution support in user management process
- Add institution field to `UsersDatum` for improved user data handling - Extend `createUser` and `updateUser` methods in `UserService` to include institution mapping - Update `DropdownField` to support `optionValue` for dynamic institution selection - Enhance address data handling with institution filtering and state management in `useAddressData` - Add institution dropdown to `UserDetails` form for better user information collection

feat: add role-based institution field handling in user management
- Add role conditions to display institution field only for 'Especialista' and 'Técnico' roles - Update `useManagement` to include institution field in user data structure - Refactor `UserDetails` component to apply role-based conditional rendering for institution dropdown

feat: update technician role menu filtering
- Add "Aplicación" to technician role menu options

chore: update `.idea` workspace settings
- Synchronize workspace configuration with updated project details - Adjust task entries and local task counter for better development tracking

feat: refine technician role menu filtering
- Update "Aplicación" menu option to show only "Patrimonio Cultural" for technicians - Apply enhanced filtering logic for cleaner role-based menu handling

feat: add public cultural heritage page and QR code dialog functionality
- Implement `PublicCulturalHeritagePropertyPage` to display detailed heritage information - Add `QRCodeDialog` for generating and downloading QR codes with enhanced user actions - Extend `CulturalPropertyService` with `getPublicCulturalProperty` for public API integration

feat: redesign public cultural heritage page layout
- Overhaul the layout of `PublicCulturalHeritagePropertyPage` for enhanced user experience - Add header, footer, and improved styling for modern visual appeal - Introduce detailed sections for general info, physical details, location, producer, and access conditions - Implement responsive design for better accessibility across devices

feat: redesign public cultural heritage page layout
- Refactor `page.tsx` to enhance maintainability and readability - Replace obsolete components with modern alternatives like `Panel` and `Accordion` - Add utility functions for formatting data and values consistently - Implement improved error and loading states with better user feedback - Refactor header and share functionalities for simplicity and responsiveness

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
feat: redesign public cultural heritage page layout
- Refactor `page.tsx` to enhance maintainability and readability - Replace obsolete components with modern alternatives like `Panel` and `Accordion` - Add utility functions for formatting data and values consistently - Implement improved error and loading states with better user feedback - Refactor header and share functionalities for simplicity and responsiveness
